description:
Senpai, Nagatoro and their classmates go skiing. Nagatoro is a good skier, but Senpai doesn`t fail to disappoint.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: I Figured That`s How You`d Ski, Senpai.
Senpai no Suberitte Yappa Sonna Kanji Nansu ne
Ça m`étonne pas que tu sois nul
センパイの滑りってやっぱそんな感じなんスね
